examples:

Describe your issue: Please get to me asap

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Do you not have a chat bot? I need real time solutions

Describe your issue: I need help with my account ASAP.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Greetings,

This is Andrew Brown with the Department of Commerce OIG. I sent a support request on 1/5/2021 and haven't heard back. There's a possibility that I'm not receiving emails from Canva's domain so if possible, please give me a call at <NUMBER>. I need to get a copy of an invoice to submit for purchase approval. Otherwise, I'll need to cancel my subscription before it renews in the next 3 days.

Thank you!

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hello, I continue to try to find a resolution to a billing problem.  I have forwarded the requested information maybe three times now and just received another message saying my inquiry has been closed out.  I still need help.  The most recent email directed me to leave info here if billing help was still needed.  Can you please forward it to staff who can respond?  Thanks very much.  I have all information needed and have been contacting your company since November '20.  Thanks again.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: No Sales dept phone # 
I need to purchase a pro account and need information from Canva and there Is no where to access this material .

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hello! I am with The United States Air Force Band, and our Pro subscription will need to be renewed soon. However, there is a new form that I need completed and signed before we can renew. Is there a good contact that I can email this form to?

Describe your issue: I need help creating , do you have training ?

Describe your issue: I have 2 files that I need in vector form or high res for a fire department billboard . Is  this possible

Describe your issue: Figured it out! SO no need to reply to my previous inquiry.

What do you need help with?: Hello! I am with The United States Air Force Band, and our Pro subscription will need to be renewed soon. However, there is a new form that I need completed and signed before we can renew. Is there a good contact that I can email this form to?

Describe your issue: Please get back to me asap

Describe your issue: I NEED TO KNOW HOW TO GET TO THE FONT FOR LETTER SIZING MY LETTERS ARE TOO LARGE AND I NEED TO MAKE THEM SMALLER

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi,

Someone is holding my BUTTONS to your site, and I need your urgent help. If you can track them on your side, I would like to report the case to the UNITED NATIONS. It needs evidence from your side. I know they will stop, but they will come back. They will just forget, and that is how you can track them. 

Regards,

<NAME>.
What kind of problem is it ?: Others Describe the problem: I NEED TO PUT COLOR TO THE BACKGROUND OF A SUBTITLE, NOT TO THE LETTER

What do you need help with ?: Hello, I have written to you a few more times before. I do not receive a confirmation mail for my account. You said in my previous conversation that he sent a confirmation mail, but it still did not come. Please help me verify my account.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: We are in the process of looking into other companies to accommodate our direct mailing pieces. We do Just Listed postcards for our agents and send to 100 properties within a certain radius of the newly listed property. We also do drip campaign postcards for some of the agents that contain recipes and things of that nature. Please reach out to Gina Romanell at <EMAIL> in response to this inquiry. Thank you!

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hello. There has been a purchase in my account that I did not make. I need this resolved please.
Thanks!

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: We would like to have individual names included on the postcards.  Is it possible to do that? Dear (first name)
What do you need help with?: I can see debits on my CC for $35.98 can you please tell me what this is for - to needs to stop!
What do you need help with?: u make everything for pros. if iyou keep this up I will give  a 1 star rating

Describe your issue: Need help with logo.

What do you need help with ?: Hello, I have notified you that I am having trouble confirming my account. I received an e-mail from you saying that you sent me a confirmation mail, but I still cannot see a confirmation mail. In the content of the mail, you told me to contact you if I do not receive my confirmation mail. Please confirm my account.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi, I just send my request for skipping my trial since 9 jan, its 4 days ago. But until now I don't have any update about this, i was answer the concern 2 times, and have no update again until now. I need it asap, do you know what ASAP mean? yes AS SOON AS POSSIBLE! it means I NEED IT IMMIDIATELY.  I need to skip my trial because my organisation need to make finance report immidiately. ARE YOU REALLY WORKING ON THIS? Oh god...

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: We reached out last week with respect to an account issue. Essentially, need assistance removing marketing collateral from one Canva account and shifting it to another. We need this to happen by end of day tomorrow, Thursday January 21st, if at all possible, or by EOD Friday at latest. Please let us know how we can get help; we upgraded to Enterprise soley to try and get some type of response.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I had no plans to renew because I bought a membership but while I was accessing a file this week I apparently. 1.) I need the charge reversed. 2.) The reason I wasn't renewing is that my employer purchased an account with five memberships and I need to operate under that ... how do I make the transition?
